snippet: LEAD: In a duel over pesticides that could have important implications for the rest of American agriculture, California growers today began collecting signatures for a ballot measure that they said would reform programs to protect food, water and ...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: In a duel over pesticides that could have important implications for the rest of American agriculture, California growers today began collecting signatures for a ballot measure that they said would reform programs to protect food, water and farm workers from toxic chemicals.

headline.main: Growers Reach for the Ballot in California Duel Over Pesticides

byline.original: By KEITH SCHNEIDER, Special to The New York Times
